transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi Saurav sir very good morning. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya bataye.
Executive: Preeti baat kar rahi thi Sudhanshu ki manager. Last time bhi aap se discussion hua tha.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan bataye.
Executive: Hai na India Mart se baat kar rahi thi. Actually aapka three months ka jo aapka issue tha sir wo resolve ho gaya hai. Aapne check kiya?
Customer: Maine mail kiya tha toh mujhe escalation team se aaya tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo aap ek bar check kar lijiye. Aapka waise main aapko ek bar screenshot bhi de deti hu. Aapki services jo ab ho chuki hai wo 6 February 2026 tak aapki end hogi sir. Theek hai? To jo three months ka aapka issue tha wo ho chuka hai. Ek bar aap mujhe batayenge apna number sir whatsapp number?
Customer: 8275
Executive: 8275
Customer: 1035
Executive: One?
Customer: 1035
Executive: Okay 035
Customer: 09
Executive: 09 okay. Theek hai 8275103509 right sir?
Customer: Right.
Executive: Ye dekhiye maine aapko screenshot bhi bhej diya ab aapki services ka jo end hai wo ab 6 February 2026 ko aapka end hoga. Theek hai usse pehle nahi hoga. To I I I hope humne aapki jo bhi concern tha wo humne resolve kar diya hai sir right? To fir ye jo aapne concern open kiya tha jo aapne mail wagera kiye the to main ye concern aapka yaha close kar dena fir?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai? To abhi na sir aapke pass na isse related na aapke pass ek mail bhi aayega service satisfy ke liye. To waha pe aap positive feedback de dijiyega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Definitely.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai aap check kar lijiye baki koi doubt ho aap directly mere ko bhi connect kar sakte ho Sudhanshu ko bhi connect kar sakte ho. Services se related jo bhi aapka issue hoga.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay theek hai okay sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's 3-month service issue not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the issue has been resolved.

- Shared screenshot of service end date: Feb 6, 2026.

- Asked to close the concern.

- Requested positive feedback on service satisfaction mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check and confirm resolution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, resolution, service end date, feedback
